data.oai_dc:dc: Files are 16-bit tiffs (which means they will appear black if opened in Preview, Photoshop, or similar program). Each file is a Multi-plane tiff, containing three fluorescence channels:Channel 1 = DAPI (Sigma)Channel 2 = NF-kappaB (anti-p65, Abcam ab16502 / Alexa-488 anti-rabbit, Invitrogen)Channel 3 = DHE (dihydroethidium, hydroethidine, Sigma)File names refer to [row][column]-[field]See ReadMe file for culture and staining information.
